website_summaries.verdict: A wearable MP3 player with everything integrated into a single piece. If you don’t mind the wrap-around style, it’s a good option.
pros: Wire-free style leaves you free to move arms and head without getting caught in a cord
Ergonomic design comfortably stays in the ears
Supports MP3, WMA, AAC, and L-PCM formats
cons: Not as durable as other options
Some units have stopped working after only a few weeks or months

customer_reviews.title: I thought Sony would know better...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for swimming. Out of the water they sound great. But, their solution to making it waterproof is to use special earbud attachments that have plastic over the earhole. Therefore, the sound at full volume when you go to swim is about a 2 when you don't have to use swim earbud attachments. Other companies have made waterproof headphones without needing to put plastic in the earhole to protect their device...
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rose Benavides

customer_reviews.title: Buy it while you can!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Sony Walkman. I broke the first trying to clean the ear screens. Wouldnt have broke if I hadnt messed with it. This is much better. They did away with the shiny plastic to a matt finish. Arranged the buttons different. The best thing i own.
customer_reviews.author: James Morales

customer_reviews.title: Be Very careful of who you buy from.
customer_reviews.text: I really don't want to upset anyone, but my rateing on this product should speak clear. I bought two before from Amazon and NEVR had any problem, but this one was through Amazon but a independent agent sold this one. So I'll let that be that.
customer_reviews.author: Ellgy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great find!!  Very glad I purchased these.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of headphones. Love that I don't have to carry my phone with me which adds weight to running and these are able to be used in the pool if I wanted to swim with music. One thing I've learned is that sometimes, after non-use for several days, they will go dormant. To reset, all you need to do is push on the ON/OFF button for 15 seconds and they'll instantly reset themselves. I was worried before a big race because I couldn't get them to turn on. You will not be disappointed with this purchase -- sound quality is clear and cancels out background noises.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Marchetti

customer_reviews.title: Works great, software could use some help...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for 'mom' for mother's day. She loves it and says it works well when she is swimming with it in the pool and she also used it on a recent cruise while we were snorkeling. Only complaint is that you have to use their software to copy files to it and their software is a little wonky (songs have to be on a fixed mounted drive for instance, and can't be on an SD card which is just a weird restriction). I took 1 star off for that.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelJ

customer_reviews.title: Original purchase and replacement will not sync with computer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in late-2017 to replace an older version which lasted me 2 years. In mid-summer, my computer would no longer recognize the Walkman; I tried 3 different computers and 2 different operating systems. I contacted Sony and per warranty they replaced the Walkman. After about 3 months, I began having the same problem. Of course, the warranty has since expired. The Walkman plays fine but I cannot add music or change playlists. I swim weekly and have appreciated the comfort and easy of use of both models. I notice that there is a new model out, but with the reliability issue, I have serious reservations about buying another Sony as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shagam

customer_reviews.title: Could not hear music while swimming
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Sony Mp3 player to listen to music while swimming. No matter what choice of earplugs I used, and no matter what ambient sound setting I used, it was very difficult to hear most songs while swimming, with the volume set at max. The noise of the whirlpool spa was even too loud to hear music. The earplugs were a perfect fit, and no water got into my ears, so I was very disappointed that most songs were very hard to hear. On the other hand, it works well on dry land, and loads songs easily.
customer_reviews.author: Vic G.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I need to swim with music
customer_reviews.text: Use these daily to swim 5 days a week for about an hour each day. The battery can almost make it to Friday , but I just charge it on Wednesdays and the weekend. The fit takes a bit of getting used to but they're comfortable once you figure it out. I tuck the wire part of the loop under my goggle straps to keep it against my head. probably the most important thing is to make sure you are using comfortable size for you and the waterproof earbud covers. So far so good I've had these for a few months and just keep forgetting to write a review, but I have recommended them personally to people I swim with.
customer_reviews.author: Clint G

customer_reviews.title: Great for sweat
customer_reviews.text: Finally! Headphones that can withstand ridiculously profuse sweating!! My husband wanted a pair of headphones with built-in storage so he didn’t have to carry his phone around with him at the gym. He also needed headphones that were waterproof because of how much he sweats (pretty sure he’s got a medical condition with the amount he sweats). This product has lasted the longest. The most common issues he’s had with headphones are: one earbud stops working, stops charging, can’t hold a charge, and buttons stop working. He’s had NONE of these issues with these headphones and he’s had them several months and uses them about five times per week for about two hours each use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have bought them 10 years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thing! My wife and I each bought a pair because we liked them so much. Before, I used bose earbuds and a ipod shuffle. The sound quality is definitely better with the Sony,as well as the sound isolation (which is important in a gym with amateurs slamming the weights every seven seconds), and there is no cord to have to run down my shirt. I sweat profusely when I work out, and they are holding up just fine. Also, I was pleasantly surprised that the software actually does sync to itunes very easily (its automatic) and allows for easy transfer, especially if you are used to the itunes layout.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Great for swimming in my pool every day
customer_reviews.text: A bit tricky to put on but easy to get a hang of it. Sound could be a bit louder but I agree it’s a good idea to be able to hear ambient sound when they are on - safety reasons. I’ve used them now atleast 30 times in my pool. It’s fantastic to swim and listen to music. I swim down to 5 feet and can still hear music. I do have a tad problem with the correct positioning on/in my ear as one always seems to be out of the eardrum but that doesn’t bother me. Battery life is great. No problems at all. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Alterio

customer_reviews.title: Great player, but.......
customer_reviews.text: I love swimming laps with this player. It is small and not bulky, fits well and has good sound quality. Unfortunately, they are not reliable and the last one I had only lasted 5 months when it quit charging. So although this is a cool little player, if this one quits (and I don't have a lot of confidence in it) I will try another brand. Which is too bad, because this player otherwise is great.
customer_reviews.author: Chompiegreen

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. completely blown away with the sound quality above and below the water. not as great as my normal in ear headphones I run with but these are much better in quality in sound that I though would be possible for something waterproof. Only downside is that on a strong kick off the wall or very aggressive sprints, they sometimes come off. To fix this I put my goggle straps over the back of the headphones from floating off. small price to pay to have music to listen to when you're doing long training swims.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Shum

customer_reviews.title: ok..
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure about these. There are TINY little buttons up on the controls to turn the music on fast forward and do volume, but when they're on it's hard to figure out which is which. I found the fit quite decent but managing my music was more complicated than I expected it to be. Having said that when they ARE working, i'm happy to have music during laps so until I find something better, these are my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Antoine Doinel

customer_reviews.title: No replacement parts. DON'T break or loose the charger.
customer_reviews.text: So totally love this product and unit. I'm a trail runner and used it religiously for well over 8 months. Then the disappointment hit.... there is NO REPLACEMENT option for the charging cradle since it's an independent unit. There is no universal option. Sony doesn't provide one, and their third party parts company they use ENCOMPASS was no help either. There is no replacement option for this model. Disappointing to say the least. I WILL NOT BUY A WHOLE NEW SET OF HEADPHONES just to get a charging cradle. I will be looking at other options with another brand. Big Fail on Sony's part.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sauers

customer_reviews.title: headphoned
customer_reviews.text: For the pool : pros : nice to hear music while swimming . So far they stil work after a few dips in the pool Cons: you can’t push off the wall or they pop out . Swim cap might keep them in place GYM pros: hold a lot of tunes , sound great , stay in your ears , very light weight Cons: music transfer can be tricky with iTunes , building playlists in the order you desire requires renumbering songs after they are loaded , hit up some forums for trouble-shooting , customer service is clueless. Most problems can be solved by hard reset of unit
customer_reviews.author: christopher doherty

customer_reviews.title: Best functionality / least comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several other underwater mp3 players and this one had the best playback functionality but hurt my ears the most. The max volume is a bit low as well. The saving grace is that it can read and skip folders, something the other two players couldn't do.
customer_reviews.author: Cardboard Horror

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't purchase this item for swimming, but I can't imagine even placing my head under water, as they would immediately fall off. The headphone does not fit secure at all. I use the headphone for walking in the pool and I have to adjust the fit several times during an hour of walking in order to hear my music. My overall rating for this product would be "3".
customer_reviews.author: Aljareda Lee

customer_reviews.title: No more boring laps
customer_reviews.text: Swimming lots and lots of laps daily is very boring... I’d been looking to Bluetooth waterproof headphones but this Sony works exactly as I wanted/hoped without needing to connect to any other device. For faster swimming or flip-turns, I had to put goggles strap over the Sony ear pieces, which really holds it in place very firmly. It feels very comfortable and I forget it’s there after a few mins. Only had it a week... works perfectly so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Died after 1 month! Not really waterproof...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it at first, but it stopped working after only one month of using it, about 2-3 times a week swimming, each time was only 30min. So a total of 5-6hrs of life... now it does not charge, even when I am able to charge it, 5min into the swim it dies...
customer_reviews.author: Swimmer

customer_reviews.title: Good for ~60 swims
customer_reviews.text: I've had 3 of these over 3 years. They all stopped working after about 60 hour long swims at public pool. Don't know if it is the battery or what as the unist still works if plugged into a computer but the buttons will not turn the units on. Otherwise it is a great little unit. Tried the waterproof Ipod shuffle & they both stopped working after about a the same 60 swims.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Top value for money
customer_reviews.text: Top value for money. Great product. Button-led controls work really well. It takes a day or two get used to them but once one gets the hang of it, using them is a breeze. Sony could have been more thoughtful or making the charging port more universal. Manufacturers cannot be assuming of end users carrying multiple cables for each of their devices. With the exception of this minor hassle, the product works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oddly shaped and don't fit
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. No matter what tricks I tried I could not get these to stay in my ears. Tried all the different earpieces and nothing worked. Unfortunately I waited past the return window to try and get these to work. Now I am stuck with them apparently. Save your $100 and get something better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great for Lap Swimming!
customer_reviews.text: So far it is working great for lap swimming. I have tried a bunch of there and this one seems like a great buy. Easy to download songs from my iTunes to the unit. Battery hasn’t died yet on me but I charge it after every 2 hours of use. Sound is great and swim ear attachments give a good secure and water free suction effect so no water gets in the ears.
customer_reviews.author: KEN GOLDBERG

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a set of headphones to wear while swimming and was hesitant to purchase these headphones due to reviews of the sound. I was pleasantly surprised with the sound quality. However, I swim only for exercise and had to continue to stop and re-position the headphones. I tried different ear pieces and nothing worked. I am returning the product. These headphones might work for other athletic activities but not for swimming...at least not for me.
customer_reviews.author: charis7

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE - NOT BLUETOOTH CAPABLE
customer_reviews.text: Understand that when reading features in detail it doesn't say that it is bluetooth capable but who even uses MP3's in the last 5 to 10 years. Sony really missed the mark with this and I am surprised they sell any of these earbuds other than to people that assume they are bluetooth capable. complete waste of money and will not buy Sony products again based on the fact that they are stuck in the early 2000's and it is unbelievable that their marketing and engineering team would bring a product to market that doesn't have the capability to use the primary method of music playback for the past 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product, broken and company will not stand behind it!  Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it a zero. 2nd pair I bought, first pair had battery issues this pair had completely come apart after about 10 uses in the left earpiece completely separated from the headset. I was having issues only hearing out of one ear for about 4 swims prior. . Amazon got Sony warranty on the phone and believe it or not they said it was cosmetic damage not their fault and they wouldn't stand by this obvious manufacture defect. HORRIBLE PRODUCT AND COMPANY WILL NOT STAND BEHIND IT! Do not Buy! I will probably never buy anything Sony again as the quality is just not even average.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT COMPATIBLE WITH CURRENT MAC OS
customer_reviews.text: I would love to be able to write about this product's fit in the water, sound quality, or other features. Unfortunately, I can't, because I couldn't even get any files loaded onto the headphones, due to incompatibility between the required file transfer software and current versions of Mac OS (I'm running an up-to-date version of Catalina). Talked to Sony support, no current software update available and no ETA for when one might be forthcoming, no workaround available. So I never got past the first step of trying to transfer content so that I could listen to it. If you have a Mac, this product will not work for you currently, maybe someday in the as-yet-unspecified future.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Backlund

customer_reviews.title: Not for swimming
customer_reviews.text: Sound is terrible volume is so low you can’t here music at all. Please someone make a pair that works. Broke after second swim. They don’t stay on while swimming. Waterproof shuffle worked but broke after waterproofing wore down. 6 months don’t buy either.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Don't use this if you value your hearing
customer_reviews.text: The older model I had to replace was much better at keeping sound under control. There's a noise pass through feature which causes so much ambient noise to get through that I had to turn my music up so loud (on a quiet road beside a lake) that my ears were ringing when I got the headset off when I got home. You can turn the 'feature' off, but that is not much better. Additionally, I cannot use my Windows Media Player to synch playlists. I don't want to add Sony's software to my system. I will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Batteries won't last more than 3 hrs
customer_reviews.text: very good quality. quite comfortable to swim with. but batteries do not last more than 3 hours per charge. this is not what is written in the description, it said that one charge lasts up to 12 hours
customer_reviews.author: Luka

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This mp 3 player is great for working out. I haven't had any problems with charging or function. It recently beyond developed some background noise in one ear piece, you don't really notice it when you're working out.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: I wish they worked!
customer_reviews.text: First set didn't work. Would not sink or be recognized by any computer. Sony sending a replacement. Got them fir Christmas and a month and a half later still have not been able to use them. No bueno!
customer_reviews.author: USA_Book_Seller

customer_reviews.title: Best headset for underwater
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for few months in swimming pool. fits well to the ears, easy operation, good quality (for a waterproof headset). Disadvantage: - Required special adapter for USB transfer and charging. - Not supplied with carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Saar

customer_reviews.title: Item not working!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item and when I got it, it would not take charge nor sync with the computer. When I inquired about trying to replace the item, I was not contacted back and now have a faulty item that I have not been given a solution to replace or to be compensated for my loss.
customer_reviews.author: Blair B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for running & working out
customer_reviews.text: These work great !!! Got them to use for a 50k !! All I wanted was some trance music to keep me moving and not die. It took me 5:46 and they were perfect !!
customer_reviews.author: cassidyfit1

customer_reviews.title: ambient noise function picks up too much background noise
customer_reviews.text: I generally don't like heavy in-ear buds, as they tend to irritate after wearing any more than an hour at a time. These are light enough that I don't really notice them unless I need to take them in and out a lot. Unfortunately, using the ambient noise function while I'm at the gym, they seem to simply amplify background noise and I still can't hear my mates (who are standing close) when they are talking to me. The background noise is even louder than when I take the earbuds out. Because of that, I have to pull an ear piece out to hear them talking, which is very frustrating because that was a big selling point for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, these just don't hold up
customer_reviews.text: Great concept but poor execution. I've owned 2 of these. I returned one within a month because a button failed. The other lasted 8 months until it started glitching during playback. Extended warranty is a must on these if you take a chance. I would advise against buying though.
customer_reviews.author: Nick-L

customer_reviews.title: 1st time, shame on them! 2nd time, shame on me!
customer_reviews.text: SWIMMING LAPS: Do not buy this product! I bought two thinking just bad luck with the first! I took extreme care each time and after 3-4 months they both stopped working. As for support, Sony does not offer on products this small! Unfortunately Amazon and Sony keep it out there under the banner of being waterproof! Consider yourself warned!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Fowler

customer_reviews.title: I love mine
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so my son didn’t want these to use for swimming. So sent back. I have a pair of the Bluetooth ones and use them in pool. So far they have held up to the pool aerobics. This why I got him a pair. Sadly he didn’t use them to know.
customer_reviews.author: daydreamer

customer_reviews.title: Great for lap swimming
customer_reviews.text: As a swimmer, I have been trying different products for years, w/different price tags. This is the first one that plays quality volume/clarity music and stays in place for an entire swim workout. I typically swim at least one mile w/flip turns and they stay in place. No question, a great product once you find out the proper band placement/ear bud sizes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mp3 player for any kind of activity!
customer_reviews.text: As an audiophile this was one of my best purchases. For the price you get good sound quality, long battery life. I am using this for running and it never fall out of my ear or was uncomfortable. It is very easy to navigate the player and it is very durable. Has great functions including on/off + 3 different level of ambient noise gate. Easy to upload music to plus it is water and dust resistant. It's compact
customer_reviews.author: Milos S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT work. Awful, Awful, Awful. Sony should do better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Anderson

customer_reviews.title: An excellent swimming companion
customer_reviews.text: You can listen to all of your favorite songs while you swim! Yes, you have to load them on the device first but 4GBs gives you plenty of room for your most motivating tunes. Side benefit, they sever as very good earplugs too. Swimming has never been so entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Herrera

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I love these things, so easy to set up and use, very comfortable, & stays on really well even during intense physical activity.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATER WORTHY
customer_reviews.text: Used twice in pool ( swimming for exercise) before the volume control no longer worked. NOT WATER WORTHY. Sent it back. Great design and fit. But, it doesn't work as described!
customer_reviews.author: JB Caring Customer

customer_reviews.title: it quit one month after I got this
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea, and I have had the older versions of this. The last one I had lasted 4 years. This one died when I was swimming after a month. I swim on top of the water so I was not 2 meters down. The pool is not 2 meters deep. I have tried to find out who to contact with defective items but Nowhere on the web site does it show how to do this. It was Sold by: Amazon.com Services, Inc. How do I get ahold of them??
customer_reviews.author: Theresa S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These work great while swimming laps. I can hear the songs, quality of sound is good. Does not fall off or mover from your ear while swimming. You hardly know you have them on. For the money well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: William Burns

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. I don't like to chat when I'm exercising. These keep people from approaching me while I am exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Fail

customer_reviews.title: Great for running!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these. I absolutely love them. I am an avid runner and really enjoy listening to audio books while running. These are perfect! They fit well, have good sound and don't fail when they get wet! That is important for me as I really sweat a lot and have ruined other players, but never my Sony Walkman! It's the best!
customer_reviews.author: Ron G. King

customer_reviews.title: Fantactic
customer_reviews.text: Only wish it had more base. I still love them. Durable and comfortable really are sweat proof. Every day I wear in the gym to lift and run cardio. They work as said in the article.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: sony underwater mp3
customer_reviews.text: best underwater mp3 player I have ever used ( have used finis, speedo and others in the past). Sound quality under water is not perfect but I swim in an endless pool and its motor makes a lot of noise. Very easy to turn on/off and change folders. ear buds stay in your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Allan I Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Sounds and battery life
customer_reviews.text: I used this for swimming and it works like a charm, no complaint.
customer_reviews.author: rayrAY

customer_reviews.title: The ambient control features are amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product so far. The main reason i bought them was because I sweat a lot at the gym and hey they are WATERPROOF. lol and it's nice to be able to listen to the songs I like and not fight with the radio or a streaming service. I download what i want on the 4gb storage and get to sweating it down.
customer_reviews.author: Lea lee

customer_reviews.title: great for running and swimming
customer_reviews.text: What I can say, it just work, great for running and swimming, I had to get rid of my phone while exercising and this is working great so far, love them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Love these 95%
customer_reviews.text: I love these for swimming laps! I don’t think I could do a mile without them! If there is a negative it is that wearing them with goggles they turn non your ear. You have to stop and readjust several times an hour. The shape isn’t really the most universally ergonomic for swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Diane O.

customer_reviews.title: Headphones break after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 2 of these devices. The first one quit working and would not turn on a little after a year. The second one only lasted 6 months. I owned a previous model of this product and it lasted much longer
customer_reviews.author: Clay C

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing, I use them for running and exercising the hold up well, lots of storage and wire free!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Work's Very Good on the pool
customer_reviews.text: Tested on the pool and riding my road bike the sound is perfect and the noise reductions is the best that I will try
customer_reviews.author: Nagaca Galvez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I don't own a smart phone for "blue tooth" headphones, so therefore, these, with the built in MP3 and memory are an excellent player and headphones in one.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: third pair in 5 months. They just give up randomly.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Not great for swimmers.
customer_reviews.text: This just wasn't for me. I didn't enjoy swimming with it in my ears and one side kept slipping out regardless what size ear piece I used.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: It was fine but stopped working after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: It was fine, did what it was supposed to do. But after 10 months, one day it just stopped working. There is no excuse for that.
customer_reviews.author: YF

customer_reviews.title: This product stopped working four months after purchase
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product until it stopped working. They were the best headphones for swimming that I have ever used, but all the left side buttons (volume included) stopped working. Amazon gave me a very short window for returns (about a month). I basically lost the money.
customer_reviews.author: Maynor Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Sound and Fit
customer_reviews.text: This is the best player I have ever bought. The sound is fantastic. i have bought 4 others ones over the years, by a different maker, and these truly are the BEST ever! Thanks for making a great product. The fit is amazing also, no falling our of you ears during swimming!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Stopped connecting to my computer after one use
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get it to connect to multiple laptops using multiple usb cords. I used it ONCE swimming. $70 is too much for one use.
customer_reviews.author: eda

customer_reviews.title: Works great in water
customer_reviews.text: Works great in water. I have not had any problems with this product. Buttons are a little hard to learn what does what at first. Sound quality is fine but wish it was a lot louder under water!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Bennett

customer_reviews.title: It makes 1 hour swim much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it and tried it today! It works! It makes 1 hour swim much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Liang Dong

customer_reviews.title: Great for Water
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. My old pair stopped working for some reason after a few years so I just bought new ones. Use them for swimming and outdoor activities
customer_reviews.author: Richard Newberg

customer_reviews.title: Second one to die
customer_reviews.text: I just bought it used from Amazon and a bit more than a month later it stopped working. This is actually the second one I buy and I have the same issue; the first time it lasted for 3 years before dying
customer_reviews.author: Renata

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Sony. I had the other for about 3 years. I swim a mile a day and use this Sony daily. I think I like this new one even better than the last one.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P.

customer_reviews.title: Works grate with no cables getting in my way
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to use and sounds grate. I like it allot and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: scott bray

customer_reviews.title: The best waterproof mp3 player for swimming
customer_reviews.text: I swim every other day and can't swim without it. I tried airborne but the sound quality does not even come close to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was fortunate enough to own the first model of these this ...
customer_reviews.text: I was fortunate enough to own the first model of these this particular walkman, many years ago...and, to this day, the product does not disappoint. With better features than it had in the past, this is a step up from the first model, without a doubt. I use this just about every day.
customer_reviews.author: Mysterious Guy

customer_reviews.title: BEST MUSIC PLAYER for Swimming (ocean and pool)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! These have upgraded swimming earbuds with thin film to prevent water intrusion. And power button is easier to press than before. I had previous model for 4 years. Hopefully these will last just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: the sound quality is not good as the former NWW
customer_reviews.text: the sound quality is not good as the former NWW. And it is not comfortable wearing it compared with the former NWW
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not working for swimming
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use it for swimming but the sound doesn't work at all. the voice is not recognizable while swimming. Of course outside swimming pool, it works perfect but I bought this for swimming only as per their claim. Can I return this?
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Important information for swimmers
customer_reviews.text: The product is really quality and cost-effective, but if you swim quickly and work hard, this product is not very suitable, it occasionally comes out of the ears. It is suitable only for those who swim calmly and do not go wild.
customer_reviews.author: Elad

customer_reviews.title: Great MP3 Player!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific MP3 player! Easy to use, sound great and don't have to mess with wires or wireless connection.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Grey not black
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, just opened box and first comment is the product is grey not black. Otherwise, so far looks good and I'm excited to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 4 months. Sony customer service was impossible to deal with. Warranty is worthless if company cannot help
customer_reviews.author: Randak

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: There are a bit low o f volume it lacks from bass and the audio quality is simple overall well constructed and durable
customer_reviews.author: Antony

customer_reviews.text: I bought it so I can use it while I was swimming, after 2 weeks stopped working and I've been taking care of accordingly to what was instructed, so no clue what happened. I'm trying to figured out if it can be fix.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Really great idea.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Highly recommended for swimmers and others who want to be in their own world while exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Scarpato

customer_reviews.title: unreliable product
customer_reviews.text: First product purchased, arrived with one of the speakers inoperable. Returned for a replacement immediately. The second product received, only lasted 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: amazing sound, very easy to secure, and great for people with social anxiety at swimming pools
customer_reviews.text: easy to adjust volume and change songs, fantastic sound quality and noise isolation. These headphones stabilize my breathing and swimming rhythm and cured my social anxiety and self-consciousness at swimming pools. A life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Yen Kei

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the past generation model
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the past generation model. They should promote it for regular gym use since that's what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Emerson Shiff

customer_reviews.title: Care
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and reliabilty. Must only use swim buds for swimming and remove excess water after swim.
customer_reviews.author: derob

customer_reviews.title: Typical Sony
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely do not buy. Sony products are bottom barrel now. Had 2 of these, 1st one barely lasted a year, 2nd one barely lasted 2 weeks. Will replace with a lesser known brand for 1/2 the price of this and take my chances. Sony can fold for all the good they are. Did I mention, do not buy?
customer_reviews.author: Dave Lefkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof MP3 player for swimmer. I personally regret that ...
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof MP3 player for swimmer. I personally regret that I should buy a bluetooth version for the daily usage, not only for the swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Seongmin Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, operates well under any situation with good sound
customer_reviews.author: Andrés Puentes

customer_reviews.title: Good for swimming
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have used it for swimming. Worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Peng

customer_reviews.title: Best Sony MP3 we've had so far.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. We've always been a fan of the Sony MP3 so we wanted to stay with that brand. He loves working out in them, mowing the lawn, and running the dog. They stay put and charge really fast.
customer_reviews.author: SReynolds

customer_reviews.title: He is a runner and loves how easy itis to change songs while running and that they ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift. He is a runner and loves how easy itis to change songs while running and that they stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Tena

customer_reviews.title: Swimmers will love it
customer_reviews.text: Work great, sound is clear underwater and they dont move at all while swiming. Very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Connor Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime is between 12-14 months
customer_reviews.text: The device suddenly stopped working. Sony support system is not useful. The life time of the product is just under 15 months. Not worth for the listed price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great until it Died
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for about 8 months and now it's dead. Always took great care of it. Very bummed since it's a huge help for long boring rehab workouts in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: KdeSP

customer_reviews.title: The charger will stop working after few months
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd time I'm buying this product, and they can't live long. After a few months, the charger won't recognize the device and you can't transfer any music.
customer_reviews.author: Idan Dagan

customer_reviews.title: Made my ears hurt.
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps because of my non-standard physical structure (I'm a big guy), but my ears remained hurt about 10 minutes after I took them off.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Nikolayev

customer_reviews.title: Quality of sound is poor underwater
customer_reviews.text: Bought it especially for swimming. It keeps detecting from ear while exercising. There is no bluetooth so you are kind of stuck with what you have in the memory..
customer_reviews.author: Yair

product_meta.title: Sony NWWS413LM 4GB Sports Wearable MP3 Player (Blue)
product_meta.description: Color:BlueBe active, be free with this wire-free, one-piece music player. A waterproof design keeps moisture out while you enjoy good vibrations. Power up with a quick 3-minute charge for up to 60 minutes of play back and enjoy drag and drop ease. It’s that free and easy.
feature_bullets: 4GB Sports Wearable MP3 Player, Waterproof: For use in salt & fresh water up to 2-meters deep, Sweat resistant, dust proof design endures through the toughest training conditions
Ergonomically designed for a secure fit and long-lasting comfort, Ambient noise function so you aren’t isolated from the world around you, Up to 12-hours playback
Drag & drop from iTunes for Mac or Windows, Playback MP3, WMA, AAC, and Linear PCM Audio Files, Supplied: USB dock, regular & swim earbuds (1set each), adjustment loop, Hi-Speed USB 2.0

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars426 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
